BR.name: Tom Clancy's Splinter Cell® 3D
BR.description: Exclusivamente para o console Nintendo 3DS, Tom Clancy’s Splinter Cell 3D é um jogo de console portátil altamente esperado da famosa série Splinter Cell e um dos títulos mais aclamados de todos os tempos pelos críticos. Sam Fisher cruza fronteiras inimigas na Península da Coreia para prevenir a Terceira Guerra Mundial ao investigar a facção responsável por ter afundado o USS Clarence E Walsh, o cruzador com tecnologia mais avançada dos Estados Unidos. Durante a sua investigação, Sam descobre que os grupos principais, que estão planejando usar os algoritmos Masse Kernels para começar a Terceira Guerra Mundial, são formados pelo companheiro de guerra Douglas Shetland, a Displace International e o Almirante Otomo, seu contato no Third Echelon Information Self Defense Force (I-SDF). A tecnologia avançada do novo Nintendo 3DS mostra aos fãs do Splinter Cell um mundo 3D de uma forma de interagir com o jogo nunca visto antes.

CA.name: Tom Clancy's Splinter Cell® 3D
CA.description: Coming exclusively to the Nintendo 3DS™, Tom Clancy’s Splinter Cell 3D is the highly anticipated hand held game in the multimillion-selling Splinter Cell series and one of the most critically acclaimed franchises of all time. Sam Fisher is sent behind enemy lines in the Korean Peninsula to prevent WWIII, by investigating the responsible party that sunk the USS Clarence E Walsh, U.S.’s most advanced cruiser. Through his investigation, Sam learns that the key parties who are planning to use the Masse Kernels to launch WWIII are war comrade Douglas Shetland, Displace International, and Admiral Otomo, the Third Echelon Information Self Defense Force (I-SDF) contact. The cutting edge hardware of the new Nintendo 3DS™ allows Splinter Cell fans to play in immersive 3D and ability to interact with the game like nothing before.

MX.name: Tom Clancy's Splinter Cell® 3D
MX.description: Disponible de manera exclusiva para la consola Nintendo 3DS™, el juego Tom Clancy’s Splinter Cell 3D es la anticipada versión portátil de la serie Splinter Cell, que ha vendido millones de copias y es una de las franquicias más aclamadas por la crítica. Sam Fisher ha sido enviado detrás de las líneas enemigas a la península coreana. Su objetivo: encontrar a los responsables del hundimiento del USS Clarence E Walsh, uno de los buques más avanzados de los Estados Unidos, y así prevenir la Tercera Guerra Mundial. Durante su investigación Sam descubre que su compañero de guerra Douglas Shetland, jefe de la empresa militar privada Displace International, y el almirante Otomo, un contacto de la Third Echelon en la Information Self Defense Force (I-SDF), son las cabezas claves de la conspiración para usar los algoritmos electrónicos “Masse Kernels” para empezar la Tercera Guerra Mundial. El innovador sistema de la nueva consola Nintendo 3DS™ permite que los fanáticos de Splinter Cell puedan sumergirse en las imágenes 3D e interactuar con el juego como jamás se ha hecho antes.

US.name: Tom Clancy's Splinter Cell® 3D
US.description: Coming exclusively to the Nintendo 3DS™, Tom Clancy’s Splinter Cell 3D is the highly anticipated hand held game in the multimillion-selling Splinter Cell series and one of the most critically acclaimed franchises of all time. Sam Fisher is sent behind enemy lines in the Korean Peninsula to prevent WWIII, by investigating the responsible party that sunk the USS Clarence E Walsh, U.S.’s most advanced cruiser. Through his investigation, Sam learns that the key parties who are planning to use the Masse Kernels to launch WWIII are war comrade Douglas Shetland, Displace International, and Admiral Otomo, the Third Echelon Information Self Defense Force (I-SDF) contact. The cutting edge hardware of the new Nintendo 3DS™ allows Splinter Cell fans to play in immersive 3D and ability to interact with the game like nothing before.
